description: meta info used by the elastic parser, all names are expected to start with x_elastic

metaInfos.description: Code used for the calculation of the elastic constants
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_code

metaInfos.description: Volume of the equilibrium unit cell
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_unit_cell_volume

metaInfos.description: Maximum lagrangian strain used to calculate the elastic constants
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_max_lagrangian_strain

metaInfos.description: Number of disordered structures used to calculate the elastic constants
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_number_of_disordered_structures
